column2:
"Wooo! I'm a ghost!
Ehehe, did I surprise you? Happy Halloween!"

"...Huh? Such a cold response...
Ohh, you don't know who I am, is that it?
I am... Magical★Xiera!"
"Ahh, an even colder response! Let me explain the situation...! You see, it seems that I'm some sort of Phantom creation."
"Ether reacted to someone's intense emotions, and I came into being as a result, just like Matoi here did before!"
"So, to make sure people can tell me apart from the real Xiera, I'm wearing this witchy-looking costume and calling myself Magical★Xiera!"

"So, while the real Xiera takes care of all the work, I'll be a witch and have fun on Halloween...
That was the idea, at least."

"The truth is, I'm a little nervous...
Can I ask you to help me? Just let me know whenever you're ready!"
"So much fun! Halloween is the best! You get to dress up in cute costumes, eat loads of sugary things and go to all sorts of places...!"
"I bet the real me is super jealous right now. Still, no sense wasting time thinking about it, I've got to enjoy every minute to the max!"
"So, here's where I'd like to go next!"
"Hello! Um, thanks for listening to so many of my requests!"
"Thanks to you, I've been able to experience so many fun things that the real Xiera could never take a break to do!"
"Don't you think it's funny when you bite into Halloween candy and it does something surprising?"
"Someone played a trick on me, so I want to get them back by playing a trick on them! That'll be fun for them too, right? So, here's my plan..."

"I'm gonna mix something up in my cauldron, something that goes jiggly and crackly and gooey...
Hehe, just you wait and see!"
"Thank you for everything! My first Halloween has been so much fun!"
"Still, what a surprise. Who'd have guessed the one who embodied me was Xiao?"
"I'm glad I had the chance to enjoy myself this much, though, and I think it's something the real me would have wanted."
"Next time I turn cute and sparkly and start flying around on a broom, you can ask Xiao all about it!"
"Anyway, let's have fun as long as this lasts! Magical★Xiera will escort you around with her miraculous powers☆"
